snippet: Using the Find My iPhone tracking feature, an owner follows the route of his device and goes online to post regular updates on its location.
abstract: Shelby Bonnie, co-founder of website CNET, followed journey of iPad he lost at airport by using Apple's Find My iPhone tracking feature; chronicled iPad's travels and eventual recovery on his Facebook account.
lead_paragraph: Using the Find My iPhone tracking feature, an owner follows the route of his device and goes online to post regular updates on its location.

headline.print_headline: An iPad, Misplaced at an Airport, Takes Its Own (Trackable) Vacation
headline.main: An iPad Misplaced at the Airport Takes Its Own Vacation
